title: Disconnecting from rank game and losing LP!?!
body: I was playing ranked with my friend and all of my teammates disconnected at the same time. And only one of us could reconnect back to the game. it was a easy win for us. But we cant even reconnect !!! Finally , we lost the game and everyone lost LP!!! ROIT !!    Here is my ID : gene1301  check my history on annie！！！！

After getting a number of reports, we realized that this was in fact an issue with our servers. You can keep up to date on the issue on our post [**here **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/3Lmbjp8Y-3132017-na-server-issues). 

Thanks for being patient with us while we set this right.

It's great you are aware of and have mostly fixed the connection issues; but what are you doing about compensating the hundreds or even thousands of players that have lost LP, promos, etc? The problem persisted now for about 12 hours -- the whole day -- and not once was loss prevention enabled. Where is the compensation for those of us who had our time and efforts wasted and lost a lot of ranked game progress due to an error on your end?

I completely understand your concern over your LP/promos/leaverbuster issues. Keep in mind that we've had a large number of players affected, and we're working as fast as possible to look into each summoners case.
